00071                 int    getListSize    ( void )

00084                 int    getCount       ( int nPos )
00085                 {
00086                         if( _isNBestMode )
00087                                 return (int)_counts[ (_orders[nPos+1] * 2) - 1 ];
00088                         else
00089                                 return (int)_counts[ (nPos*2) + 1];
